channel.title: How do fix the thing that u hit harder with str than att :confused:
channel.description:
public void CalculateMaxHit() { double MaxHit = 0; int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; //Strength Bonus int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; //Strength if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { //Accurate & Defensive MaxHit += (double)(1.05 + (double)((double)(StrBonus * Strength) * 0.00175)); } else if (FightType == 2) { //Aggresive MaxHit += (double)(1.35 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00525)); } else if (FightType == 3) { //Controlled MaxHit += (double)(1.15 + (double)((double)(StrBonus) * 0.00175)); }
i thaught it had something to do with that :| i know u can change how hard u hit with what attack style but i want that i can't hit harder with attack than with strength otherwise it has no point for trainen strength rofl![br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 06:50:30 AM[/size][hr]any post back please :confused: :|

item.title: How do fix the thing that u hit harder with str than att :confused:
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
